publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4448 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Advice and Assistance (Assistance By Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2006—That the Justice 1 Committee recommends that the Draft Advice and Assistance (Assistance By Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2006 be approved. Supported by: Hugh Henry*

S2M-4448 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Advice and Assistance (Assistance By Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2006—That the Justice 1 Committee recommends that the Draft Advice and Assistance (Assistance By Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2006 be approved.
